alert.note: Alert for Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 15 at 12:57AM MST until February 15 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING ABOVE 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 5000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Mazatzal Mountains, Pinal/Superstition Mountains and Southeast Gila County. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST early this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 5 above zero could result in hypothermia or frostbite if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County
